meanings.definition: Arrange (text) in a particular style or size of type.
meanings.sent1: She typesets the document to make it look neat and organized.
meanings.sent2: The graphic designer typesets the book cover for the new novel.
meanings.sent3: The teacher typesets the assignment instructions in a fun font to engage the students.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity typesets the words on the page like a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent5: The way she typesets the text makes it easy to read and understand.

meanings.definition: A collection of type of a particular design.
meanings.sent1: The printing press has a variety of typesets for different projects.
meanings.sent2: He carefully selected the typesets for the logo to represent the company's image.
meanings.sent3: The old bookstore owner proudly displays his collection of unique typesets.
meanings.sent4: The typesets in the vintage magazine evoke a sense of nostalgia.
meanings.sent5: The typesets used in the newspaper headline grab the reader's attention.
